citations.narrative:
During morning observation checks of 05 July 2023, an animal caretaker found the exhibited Burmese python out of their
enclosure and inside the rabbit enclosure, of which 3 out of 4 rabbits were absent (Peter, Tutu, Sarabi). The rabbits could
not be located anywhere inside the facility or outdoors. According to the exhibitor, the python appears more rotund than
usual and it is presumed that the python consumed the 3 rabbits. The animals are indoor housed in separate enclosures
that share a common solid wall. The entrance to the rabbit enclosure is a half wall that is approximately 5 feet tall with a
wide air gap to the ceiling. It is undetermined how the python escaped their padlocked enclosure at this time. Primary
enclosures housing rabbits that can be breached by wild or captive predators can result in their injury or death. Primary
enclosures for rabbits shall be constructed and maintained to keep predators out.
Correct from this date forward of 10 July 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.53(a)(1)  Critical
   
Primary enclosures. 
During morning observation checks of 05 July 2023, an animal caretaker found the exhibited Burmese python out of their 
enclosure and inside the rabbit enclosure, of which 3 out of 4 rabbits were absent (Peter, Tutu, Sarabi). The rabbits could 
not be located anywhere inside the facility or outdoors. According to the exhibitor, the python appears more rotund than 
usual and it is presumed that the python consumed the 3 rabbits. The animals are indoor housed in separate enclosures 
that share a common solid wall. The entrance to the rabbit enclosure is a half wall that is approximately 5 feet tall with a 
wide air gap to the ceiling. It is undetermined how the python escaped their padlocked enclosure at this time. Primary 
enclosures housing rabbits that can be breached by wild or captive predators can result in their injury or death. Primary 
enclosures for rabbits shall be constructed and maintained to keep predators out. 
 
Correct from this date forward of 10 July 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
